item.title: Mac_Commands_Shortcuts
item.description: Shortcut Function ctl+k Clear the terminal window ctl+t Open a new tab in the current window Commands Find the PID of a process listening on a port (pass the -i flag and the port number to significantly speed up the searching): 1 2 3 $ lsof -Pi :3000 COMMAND PID USER FD TYPE DEVICE SIZE/OFF NODE NAME node 10832 yulin 27u IPv4 0xc9491b9285959cf 0t0 TCP *:3000 (LISTEN) Kill this process:
